alert.title: Inspect DDO
alert.description: Gives details about the Digital Data Object.
alert.js: var result = {};function recurse (cur, prop) {if (Object(cur) !== cur) {result[prop] = cur;} else if (Array.isArray(cur)) {for(var i=0, l=cur.length; i<l; i++)recurse(cur[i], prop + '[' + i + ']');if (l == 0)result[prop] = [];} else {var isEmpty = true;for (var p in cur) {isEmpty = false;recurse(cur[p], prop ? prop+'.'+p : p);}if (isEmpty && prop)result[prop] = {};}}recurse(digitalData, '');tealiumTools.send( result );
